TypeSignature.Value: public delegate System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<string> CipherSuitesCallback(SecurityProtocolType protocol, IEnumerable<string> allCiphers);
.class public auto ansi sealed CipherSuitesCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The SSL/TLS protocol version used for the connection.
The ordered list of all supported cipher suites.
Docs.summary: You can provide your own code to filter/re-order the cipher suites to be used for client and/or server side SSL/TLS support.
Docs.returns: The ordered list of all cipher suites you wish to support.

remarks.para: This type is only available in Mono and Xamarin products.
See the property for examples of how this is used.
